* 1) Download the SDK Starter Package : http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html

* 2) Unpack it

* 3) Installation of ADT :
	# - Install the Android Development Tools (ADT) Plugin : Help -> Install New Software 
	# - Enter the address : http://dl-ssl.google.com/android/eclipse/
	# - Click Add
	# - Select Developer Tools -> Click Next 
		
* 4) Configuration of ADT :
	# - Window -> Preferences -> Android
	# - Enter the SDK Location (see 1)
	# - Apply

* 5) Complementary Installation	
	# - Window -> Android SDK and AVD Manager
	# - Navigate (in a terminal) to the tools/ directory in the Android SDK (see 1), then execute: ./android
	# - In the new window open : Settings : Enter the settings of the proxy, and enable "Force https://... sources to be fetched using http://..."
	# - Available Package : Refresh : Install all the available components
	# - Install Selected -> Install
	# - Restart Eclipse
